messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle issue when adding sent issue when adding hi encountered following issue when trying complete absence date must be scheduled work think reason for because when added annual leave before migration set period period included two public holidays for days period have only days taken annual leave error here but when tried add for th public holiday information get error mentioned think somehow reason added entire interval for annual leave can you please help with added print screens best regards

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket into one of the specified categories: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, or Administrative rights. The content of the ticket is a bit garbled but seems to relate to an Oracle issue regarding adding absence dates and annual leave, especially around a migration that includes public holidays. It appears to involve HR issues, so HR Support might be the right category.**Categorizing IT Issue**

I’m considering the right category for the IT ticket, and "HR Support" looks appropriate since it deals with HR processes—like annual leave, absence dates, and public holidays around a migration in an Oracle system. "Administrative rights" and "Internal Project" don’t seem suitable. So, I’ll respond with a JSON category object specifying "HR Support" since that matches the content. The format will be straightforward: {"category":"HR Support"}. Let’s make sure it’s properly formatted!
